query: who is the smartest person in the world?
contexts: Hu Xiaolian:  She was ranked fourth on "The Wall Street Journal"' s "The 50 Women to Watch 2008" list and was referred to as "one of the most powerful people in the world".
Enrico Fermi:  He was one of the very few physicists in history to excel both theoretically and experimentally.
Weili Dai:  As of 2015, she is listed as the 95th most powerful woman in the world by "Forbes".
Fayez Sarofim:  With an estimated current net worth of $1.91 billion, Sarofim is ranked by "Forbes" as the 847-richest person in the world, in 2015.

Warren Buffett:  He is considered by some to be one of the most successful investors in the world, and as of August 2017 is the second wealthiest person in the United States, and the fourth wealthiest in the world, with a total net worth of $76.9 billion.
